caption.p: Effect of different polysaccharide on blood coagulation. ( a) Effect of rhamnan sulfate (RS) (●) and heparin ( ○) on extrinsic coagulation measured by prothrombin time (PT). ( b) Effect of RS (●) and heparin ( ○) on intrinsic coagulation measured by activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT). The data are cited from [ 14]. Reproduced with permission from Springer Nature, 2019.
